title: @Riot KateyKhaos about future Talon skins
body:
Hey there! 

Not sure if you have seen the following skin concepts already but please look at them! :(
I'm waiting for a new Talon skin for pretty long(yeah he got SSW but it somehow doesn't count in normal skin cycle as far as i know)

I'd love to own one of them(or all)! :(

http://pre02.deviantart.net/fb11/th/pre/i/2014/044/6/2/debonair_talon_by_runescratch-d76dhhc.jpg
http://pre07.deviantart.net/ca80/th/pre/i/2014/218/2/d/soul_reaver_talon_by_blandstufftastesnice-d7tx3xf.png
https://41.media.tumblr.com/a2fa26f6cbdbe4f6e8aab28befe0551f/tumblr_nmwk455NoU1tirp9oo1_500.png
http://66.media.tumblr.com/40e4d94c953e6b124c46f8be34aad0fe/tumblr_mgyxifKGyj1r4mr8ho1_500.jpg



Oh and I really like those glasses on that debonair skin! (like the stuff with nighthunter rengar and vi's release skin! please do stuff like that! it's so cool!)

Sorry for being annyoing. T_T

replies.body:
Hey! 

Nah, we don't count esports skins towards the catalog, technically. These ideas are fantastic. I actually have the Soul Reaver one saved from a while back - I'd love to see that one come to life. ^-^

Kitty cat! Make it a skin for all the Du Coteau champs!

http://i.imgur.com/UFfj1L3.jpg

I prefer this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/QW8zNFRP-battle-bunny-talon
http://new2.fjcdn.com/comments/And+what+s+next+battle+bunny+talon+_212c57b3611b5d397724fb57e92adb74.jpg

:D


(i also saw a coslplay of this, it was awesome :D)

Cats>Bunnies

Also Battle Bunny makes me think of Riven, which in turn makes me sick.
Also teemo
Hey!  You!  With the face!  Come play league with me!
Sure! When?

I'd like to play league with you too!

~Notice me senpai~
If we can all agree on a time later this week, I'd be down. :)

~Senpai noticed me~

I have finals all this week until Friday, 4:00-6:30 today, 2:00-6:30 on Tuesday, 1:00-6:30 Wednesday-Thursday, and 1:00 until like 10:00 on Friday. Every day after Friday is summer break, so I can come on at literally any time. 

Sorry for the complete schedule! Just let me know which time works for you and I'll be there!

(These times are all in PM, and I live in Chicago)
Let's go for 8PM PST on Tuesday, does that work?
That is about 10:00 pm my time, I'd be studying by then. If all else fails is Friday a good option?

Let's do Friday - sorry about the 20 times here. ;_; Work's been insane. Would 3 PM PST okay with you?

**EDIT** Sending you a friend request, just in case we need to communicate more about this. :P
So wait, can I just ask a rioter to play and they may accept?? Boldness works??
You can! I personally try to play for 1000th wins or birthdays! I also sometimes make customs and post about it on the boards - anyone is welcome to join those! :)
What about us on EUNE? Do rioters still exist here? The chat channel "playwithriot" is always empty these days (Found out about the channel from a rioter on the old forums).
There are Rioters on EUNE, although I can't speak to why they may/may not be in the chat.

Absolutely! That works perfectly!

Hope everything at work is going good!

Quick question: Do rioters normally get in a Skype/Discord call with other players they get in a game with? Or do you consider it awkward or weird?

Excellent! 

Things are movin' along - no huge issues! 

Ehh, I personally don't mind - Discord would be my preference!

Alright! I'll make sure to make a server tomorrow.

Quick question, if my friend wants to tag along, at most 2, would that be alright with you?
Me too?

Hey! I have an update with my free times, and I'll convert it to PST for ease.

Thursday: 8:30 A.M.-4:30 P.M.
Friday: 7:30 A.M.-12:00 A.M.

Let me know if either of those timeframes work for you. Sorry for the spam!

> [{quoted}](name=TheOperatorsBox,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LMv9juH1,comment-id=000200010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-23T17:39:13.946+0000)
>
> ~Senpai noticed me~
> 
> I have finals all this week until Friday, 4:00-6:30 today, 2:00-6:30 on Tuesday, 1:00-6:30 Wednesday-Thursday, and 1:00 until like 10:00 on Friday. Every day after Friday is summer break, so I can come on at literally any time. 
> 
> Sorry for the complete schedule! Just let me know which time works for you and I'll be there!
> 
> (These times are all in PM, and I live in Chicago)

Sorry for the spam, but any chance we can play any of those days?
Also, what kind of approach do Rioters take when playing with peasants? Is it normal to be in a Skype/Discord room with them?

What roles do you play, and who is your favorite champion for the role(s)?

Well, not tonight, cause, you know...overwatch :/

Maybe tomorrow night for my burfday!?!?!

I should be around.

Let's go for 8PM PST on Tuesday, does that work?
I am ready for ya!
Gahhh. I'm so sorry. D: First off, happy belated birthday! Work got super insane and I missed the game :c Would I be able to make it up to you Friday at noon PST?
I could do Saturday at noon PST :)  I work Friday until 2 your time.  So if you wanna play during your work hours (jealous) I could play around 3 your time

3 PM PST works well for me!

**EDIT** Gonna shoot you a friend request. :)
I saw your friend request before reading this, and I nearly went ballistic. Just the friend request alone made my day :D
Awww! <3
Awesome sauce!  See ya then! :)
Woot woot!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LMv9juH1,comment-id=0002000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-26T17:09:51.838+0000)
>
> Gahhh. I'm so sorry. D: First off, happy belated birthday! Work got super insane and I missed the game :c Would I be able to make it up to you Friday at noon PST?

 i will fight you if you leave me out of this

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LMv9juH1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-21T00:15:49.777+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> Nah, we don't count esports skins towards the catalog, technically. These ideas are fantastic. I actually have the Soul Reaver one saved from a while back - I'd love to see that one come to life. ^-^

Wow thanks for the reply!
Im pretty happy about that answer. :D
Really hope I'll get a skin for him this year.
Im hyped always when a new PBE cycle is coming. XD

> Im hyped always when a new PBE cycle is coming. XD

You and me both. It's like internet Christmas every two weeks. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LMv9juH1,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2016-05-23T17:12:07.556+0000)
>
> You and me both. It's like internet Christmas every two weeks. ^-^

Exactly. :D

Pretty accurate way to describe it actually!
I keep hoping to see ''*something* Gangplank (750 RP)'' every second tuesday ;-P

Please these would all be amazing. Talon had been my favorite champ since his release and in 5 years no other champ has been able to replace him for me.
 
SSW was a great skin and one of his best in a lot of ways but I just can't help and want one above the 975 range just once.
If soul reaver becomes a reality, Im buying it. Id love to see an Assassin Creed Talon skin come to life.
Is it just me, or does Debonair Talon look a lot like he's wearing the Byrgenwerth Scholar robes from Bloodborne?
KateyKhaos isn't responsible for skins she's just someone who explains about the skins.
